name: singularity
postStartCommand: /bin/bash -lc 'set -e; if command -v pg_isready >/dev/null 2>&1; then for i in $(seq 1 30); do pg_isready -q && break || sleep 1; done; psql -U postgres -d postgres -c "CREATE ROLE singularity WITH LOGIN SUPERUSER PASSWORD '\''singularity'\''';" >/dev/null 2>&1 || true; psql -U postgres -d postgres -tc "SELECT 1 FROM pg_database WHERE datname = '\''singularity'\''" | grep -q 1 || createdb -U postgres singularity; fi'
